items.title: Shared telemetry pipeline online
items.notes: Astronomy, atomic, and mission feeds normalized into unified buffers with drift monitoring.

items.title: Physics-informed simulators integrated
items.notes: Orbital and atomic simulators co-simulate within scheduling lattice, validated against rehearsal data.

items.title: Symbolic constraint libraries validated
items.notes: Constraint suites for astronomy, atomic, and mission-planning modules pass regression harness.

items.title: Financial and compliance feeds wired
items.notes: General ledger synchronizes regulatory sources with anomaly hooks raising alerts.

items.title: Collaboration analytics launched
items.notes: Team intelligence dashboards reveal sentiment and mitigation patterns.

items.title: Automated anomaly escalations activated
items.notes: Escalation logic aligned with regulatory guardrails routes issues to compliance leads.

items.title: Adaptive mentorship agents shipped
items.notes: Cohort mentors use contextual prompts and reflection loops.

items.title: Skill ontologies connected to upskilling
items.notes: Graph links assessments to learning pathways with readiness scoring.

items.title: Ethical checkpoints enforced
items.notes: Wisdom reasoning blocked without documented ethical compliance.

items.title: Keys and telemetry rotated
items.notes: Rotation cadence verified with proof artifacts stored in audit stream.

items.title: Proof-of-stake incentives stress-tested
items.notes: Adversarial simulations confirm validator payouts remain in equilibrium.

items.title: Policy verification automated
items.notes: Validators auto-run compliance templates across transaction types.

items.title: Real-time market data streaming
items.notes: Multi-venue OHLC data feeding candle analytics store.

items.title: Indicators recalibrated with historical tests
items.notes: Backtests rerun over ten-year corpora to tune thresholds.

items.title: Quote pricing heuristics tuned
items.notes: Contract and risk signals reshape quoting multi-factor model.

items.title: Evolving glossaries curated
items.notes: Term stewardship playbooks operational with drift alerts.

items.title: Provenance tracking attached to references
items.notes: Knowledge graph connectors embed citation lineage and metadata.

items.title: Factuality and readability checks enforced
items.notes: Text generation pipeline rejects outputs without high factual + clarity scores.

items.title: Meta-learning policy libraries active
items.notes: Policy selection API surfaces best-fit methods per objective.

items.title: Adaptive incident playbooks authored
items.notes: Incident templates include dynamic branching and rollback triggers.

items.title: RL experiments scheduled for routines
items.notes: Experiment calendar reserves compute and evaluation slots.

items.title: Grid telemetry integrated
items.notes: Demand-response signals loop into optimisation routines.

items.title: CV-assisted recycling pilots deployed
items.notes: Sorting models measure contamination rate and feedback to RL agents.

items.title: Biosafety monitoring defined
items.notes: Stem-cell workflows include biosafety telemetry and guardrail reviews.

items.title: Causality datasets formalized
items.notes: Dataset splits curated for counterfactual benchmarking.

items.title: Geometric deep learning models trained
items.notes: Multimodal corpora produce embeddings for experimental reasoning.

items.title: Philosophical stress tests executed
items.notes: Ultimate-reality synthesis validated against pluralistic value scenarios.

pulses.narrative: Unified telemetry fabric streaming observatory, atomic lab, and mission control feeds into shared buffers; simulators backtest orbital trajectories with symbolic constraints passing regression suites.
Telemetry adapters stitched across astronomy, atomic, and mission planners; simulator coupling validated against launch rehearsal datasets.
Financial and compliance feeds mapped into accounting GL and forecasting models; collaboration analytics dashboards highlight sentiment and regulatory escalations auto-filed.
Initial compliance ingestion stood up with anomaly webhooks; collaboration analytics alpha surfaced cross-team blockers.
Adaptive mentorship agents live with contextual playbooks; skill ontology graph linked to personalised upskilling; ethical checkpoints gating wisdom outputs.
Mentorship agent pilots launched across cohorts with skill ontology ingestion underway and ethics reviewers defining guardrails.
Encryption keys rotated with telemetry proof; proof-of-stake stress simulations show incentives stable under attacks; validator policy automation closing audit gaps.
Telemetry coverage added to key rotation workflows; validator simulations instrumented for baseline attack vectors.
Realtime market streams flowing into candles store; indicators recalibrated on historical replay; pricing heuristics tuned against contract risk signals.
Market data ingestion running in staging with indicator calibration experiments queued.
Glossary governance loop auto-detects term drift; references now carry provenance IDs; text generation pipeline enforces factuality and readability scores.
Initial glossary curation established with provenance hooks prototyped for reference services.
Meta-learning policy library powering method selection; adaptive incident playbooks authored with branching tests; RL experiment scheduler optimising routine throughput.
Policy repository seeded with baseline heuristics; playbook authoring backlog prioritized.
Grid telemetry integrated into optimisation loops; CV-assisted recycling pilots producing contamination metrics; stem-cell workflows monitored with biosafety alerts.
Grid telemetry ingestion staged; recycling computer vision pipeline calibrated on pilot datasets.
Causality datasets formalised with benchmark splits; geometric deep learning models trained on multimodal corpora; philosophical stress tests exercised across value synthesis stack.
Initial causality dataset scaffolding published; geometric model training pipeline provisioned.
